TopicTitle: [0.17] VTOL craft that didn't flip on the fly, please?

Articles.Content:
Any parts from stock, novapunch pack, tiberdyne shuttle and damnedrobotics can be used (or any other with reference to mod given). I'm also using mechjeb.

I have tried to make something Osprey-styled, but every craft I make flips sooner or later and spins uncotrollably.

Maybe four-engine craft will be more stable?

Probably. Remember that changing the pitch (Dammned robotics) DRAMATICALLY changes your center of gravity. try using the new Center of thrust and Center of gravity indicators. try to make them match, and and a ton of rcs, so that when you move, you will keep on course.
